body:
As of #955 we have a favicon asset, set using a simple `link` tag:

```
<link rel="icon" href="{{STATIC_URL}}img/favicon.ico">
```

This meets the front end needs, however I'm 99% sure that doesn't solve the API view business. @mastizada , if you're interested in taking over the django side, you're more than welcome to! Otherwise, this issue can probably be closed.
